title: LF Silver 5+ Mid Laner
body:
We are a close group of friends that know each other personally in RL. We are starting a ranked 5s team and need a strong mid laner to be an addition to our team. This selection will not be solely based on skill , but more based on the potential skill to grow with the team.  The team needs a strong communicating mid laner who as the ability to govern the team and reside as a leader/ co-leader position. We are eager to play and learn more therefore,  we are looking someone who will be willing to grow longterm with us.  Please fill out an app below and submit. We will be trying out most of the people tonight as much as possible. 

Application
IGN:
S4 Rank:
Current Rank and lp:
Favorite Champs (In Mid):
Champs you want to learn (In Mid):
Personal Strengths:
Personal Weaknesses:

replies.body:
IGN: WOLF Chijeu
S4 Rank: Silver 1
Current Rank and lp: Silver 5 27 lp 
Favorite Champs (In Mid): Zed, orianna, lissandra, yasuo
Champs you want to learn (In Mid): azir (i bought him just suck with him)
Personal Strengths: Consistent cs scores early to mid game, know when powerspikes are, can shotcall a bit, doesnt rage.
Personal Weaknesses: Pressing f keys to check on lanes, sometimes take jungler creeps, sometimes id rather teamfight than cs late game so my cs score suffers.

Application
IGN: XxSwag420Y0l0xX
S4 Rank: None (Gold 2 in S5 Preseason)
Current Rank and LP: Silver 2 - 17
Favorite Champs: {{champion:103}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:238}} 
Champs I Want To Learn: {{champion:30}} 
Personal Strengths: Very Mechanically Skilled, Good Warding, Good Roaming/Splitting, Positioning in Fights
Personal Weaknesses: Too aggressive, need to watch minimap more

Application
IGN: ImTryingToLearn
S4 Rank: Gold 4
Current Rank and lp: Gold 1 - 100 (Elo decayed out of plat)
Favorite Champs (In Mid): LeBlanc, Xerath, Ahri, Zed, Nidalee, Lissandra
Champs you want to learn (In Mid): Vlad
Personal Strengths: Good mechanics, able to make plays.
Personal Weaknesses: Very aggressive, I deal poorly with being camped.
